name: Sacrifice (itch) (2 Odd Cathodes)
description:
Hey, we're a two man team called 2 Odd Cathodes. And this was a game for our first game jam. We unfortunately couldn't finish in time. But, we finished it in one more day. Give it a go :)

Controls:

Movement- W A S D

Attack- L Click

Block- R Click

Jump- Space

Dash- Shift
